name: Chad Broski and the Great Bromine Crisis
name_original: Chad Broski and the Great Bromine Crisis
description:
Chad Broski and the Great Bromine Crisis is the biggest game I've made to date! I'm so pumped that you guys are going to play it.

Um... just note that because of how awesome it is, the game takes a little while to load.

Controls:
move: wasd or arrows

space: jump

mouse: aim

left click: fire

e: deploy bromine

1: teleport

2: dimension shift

z: inventory

r: interact or attack

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022 - Theme "It is NOT real"
